attributes.action: I would like to remove India from Government Aid
attributes.background:
India refuse to condemn Russia for their actions which is, in my opinion, is a total betrayal of the UK Government as to our support of the Ukranian campaign..
Should they maintain this stance, any International Aid funding, or other funding, should be withdrwan

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610492
